column1: Local Foods////Love this place! It's great for lunch
column2: has a fun atmosphere and the staff is all so friendly. If you can't decide on what to order for your sides
column3: no problem they will give you some samples! I've tried most of their menu and have loved it all! I had never eaten kale before coming here and now I get the kale every time - it's delicious. One of my favorite sandwiches is the falafel. MMMMM!!! Everything tastes so fresh and be sure to get their orange
column5: limeade drink - it's so good and refreshing!
